actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to repeal the requirement that the State implementation plans provide for the periodic inspection and testing of motor vehicles.

summary.text: Amends the Clean Air Act to repeal the requirement that State implementation plans for meeting the national primary ambient air quality standard provide for periodic inspection and testing of motor vehicles.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to repeal the requirement that the State implementation plans provide for the periodic inspection and testing of motor vehicles.
